activities: We gather employee demographic information including name, address, date of birth, national identifier, visa and passport information and educational background. We use this in the general course of employment as necessary.   We also gather and store salary information and provide this data payroll in order to pay our employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization Human Resources Data, some of which includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: EEA Data Protection Authorities & Swiss FDPIC, as applicable.
